definition: doghouse/kennel
dog/CL:隻|只[zhi1],條|条[tiao2]
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods
there's no place like home (idiom)
pinyin: jin1 wo1 yin2 wo1 bu4 ru2 zi4 ji3 de5 gou3 wo1
containing_words.word: 金窩銀窩不如自己的狗窩

sentences.english: That inspector inspected the kennels and the puppies in it .
sentences.chinese: 檢查員檢查了狗窩和裏面的小狗。

sentences.english: The dog is kenneled at night.
On coop or kennel he hangs Parian wreaths;
sentences.chinese: 給雞籠和狗窩掛上白色的花環。

sentences.english: Then they saw the dogs weren't in the pen.
sentences.chinese: 後來她們發現那狗不在狗窩裏。
我就是住在一個狗窩裏。

sentences.english: When was the last time you cleaned out the dog kennel?
sentences.chinese: 你上次是什麼時候打掃狗窩的？

sentences.english: Marvin loves to sleep in his doghouse .
Down at the Institute, I was in the doghouse.
sentences.chinese: 在研究所裏，我就是住在一個狗窩裏。

sentences.english: She kennels her dog in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 她把狗關進院子的狗窩裏。

sentences.english: From his seat at the bar, the dog licks my finger, nibbling gently at the tip.
sentences.chinese: 小狗窩在它主人懷裏，舔我的手指，輕咬我的指尖。

sentences.english: London opening is so BAD that my dog ran back to his den half way through.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦奧運太水了，連我的狗都中途回到了狗窩。

sentences.english: Sporting dogs should be kept out of doors in a kennel .
sentences.chinese: 獵狗應該養在戶外的狗窩中。

sentences.english: God, this place has gone to the dogs.
sentences.chinese: 上帝啊，這地方要變成狗窩了。

sentences.english: The bull-dog lay stretched on the straw outside his kennel .
sentences.chinese: 那隻鬥牛狗也伸長腿在狗窩前的草堆上懶洋洋地躺着。

sentences.english: Husbands and wives use thisdoghousedoghouse term when they are angry at each other.
sentences.chinese: 夫婦間在跟對方生氣時也會使用狗窩一詞。

definition: older man/man of mature years (Japanese loanword)
leopard cat/raccoon dog/palm civet
bachelor/unmarried man
what remains unseen is deemed to be clean/what the eye doesn't see, the heart doesn't grieve over (idiom)
chicken coop
the breeding season (zool.)/oestrus (period of sexual receptivity of female mammals)
Ruddy Shelduck (Tadorna ferruginea)/same as 赤麻鴨|赤麻鸭
picnic blanket
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
from the inside to the outside/through and through/thoroughly
to withdraw/to hole up
summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
sari (loanword)
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
buffoon/clown/ridiculous person
